rows.label: qst000801_msg0001
rows.name:
It's broken... Someone
must have tried to pry
open this chest and failed.

rows.label: qst000801_msg0101
rows.name:
It's snapped... Looks like
someone tried to pry this
chest open and failed.

rows.label: qst000801_msg0102
rows.name: There's some writing on the handle...

rows.label: qst000801_msg0201
rows.name:
Snapped clean in two... Looks
like someone tried to pry open
this chest and failed.

rows.label: qst000801_msg0202
rows.name:
What's this? There's
writing carved into it...

rows.label: qst000801_msg0301
rows.name:
It's broken right in half, mo!
Someone must have tried to pry
open this chest and failed, mo!

rows.label: qst000801_msg0302
rows.name:
Mo mo? There's writing
on the handle, mo...

rows.label: qst000801_msg0401
rows.name:
It is broken... Someone
must have tried to pry open
this chest and gave up.

rows.label: qst000801_msg0402
rows.name: Hm? There is writing on the hilt...

rows.label: qst000801_msg0501
rows.name:
"To my beloved grandson, Erebos.
May fortune be with you."

rows.label: qst000801_msg0502
rows.name:
This looks important... If
we meet the owner, we should
ask them about it.

rows.label: qst000801_msg0503
rows.name:
This looks important... Maybe
we should ask the owner about
it if we meet them.

rows.label: qst000801_msg0504
rows.name:
This looks important... If
we meet the owner, I'll be
sure to grill 'em about it.

rows.label: qst000801_msg0505
rows.name:
Erebos forgot this, mo! We
have to deliver it, mo!

rows.label: qst000801_msg0506
rows.name:
If we meet the owner, we should
inquire about the circumstances.
